original_text: You sat on a stately couch, with a table spread before it on which you had placed my incense and my oil.
korean_text: 화려한 자리에 앉아 앞에 상을 차리고 내 향과 기름을 그 위에 놓고

sentences.original_text: You sat on a stately couch
with a table spread before it
on which you had placed my incense and my oil
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에 너는 나의 향과 나의 기름을 놓아두었었다
